template <typename BlockT, typename LP, typename RP, typename AT>
class vsip::impl::Ext_data
File: ../../../vsip/core/extdata.hpp

High-level data access class. Provides data access to data stored in blocks, using an appropriate low-level data interface.

Template parameters:

BlockT:is a block type.
LP:is the desired layout policy for the data access.
RP:is a reference counting policy.
AT:is a data access tag that selects the low-level interface used to access the data. By default, Choose_access is used to select the appropriate access tag for a given block type BlockT and layout LP.
Notes:
Selecting a specific low-level interface is discouraged. Selecting one that is not compatible with BLOCK will result in undefined behavior.
